alert.note: Alert for Denver; Jefferson (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 3:17PM MDT until June 29 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Denver County in northeastern Colorado... Northern Jefferson County in central Colorado... * Until 400 PM MDT. * At 317 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Red Rocks Park, or 14 miles west of Denver, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Golden, Lakewood, southeastern Arvada, northern Englewood, Wheat Ridge and Sheridan. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for central and northeastern Colorado. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for central and northeastern Colorado.
